item.title: Project Genius pyramid puzzle
item.description:
[A catch-up article from Christmas, 2020]

My family knows I have a fondness for puzzles, so my son will typically gift me a few each year at Christmas. Among the puzzles received this year was the Project Genius Pyramid:

This is pretty entertaining to play with -- since the planes and …
item.dc:creator: Fritz Mueller

item.title: three.js and JSFiddle
item.description: Here's a small web toy, as a test of embedding a client-side visualisation in this blog. The toy written in JavaScript using the Three.js 3D graphics library, and is hosted at JSFiddle.net. If you click the "Edit in JSFiddle" link, you'll go off site to a full multi-pane …
item.dc:creator: Fritz Mueller
